attributes.content: Airtel Kenya is the fastest growing mobile services provider and mobile money services provider in Kenya. It is one of the 14 operations that Airtel Africa runs in the Africa continent since November 2010 following the acquisition of Zain by Bharti Airtel, earlier in June the same year. Airtel is dedicated to delivering unparalleled connectivity and empowering experiences to our valued customers across the nation.

attributes.name: title
attributes.content: Botswana Civil Servants Pension Fund | Project Pipeline

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Botswana Public Officers Pensions Fund (BPOPF) is the biggest pension fund in Botswana. The Fund was registered in 2001 as a result of a Government decision to change the Public Officers Pension arrangement from a Defined Benefit Pension Scheme to a Defined Contribution Pension Scheme. The Fund has experienced phenomenal growth since its inception owing to the overwhelming positive response as public servants exercised their option to join the fund.

body.value: Botswana Public Officers Pensions Fund (BPOPF) is the biggest pension fund in Botswana. The Fund was registered in 2001 as a result of a Government decision to change the Public Officers Pension arrangement from a Defined Benefit Pension Scheme to a Defined Contribution Pension Scheme. The Fund has experienced phenomenal growth since its inception owing to the overwhelming positive response as public servants exercised their option to join the fund. At the heart of what we do is our focus on our members and pensioners, which compels us to constantly and consistently seek solutions to meet their needs. As is required by the Retirement Funds Act, the BPOPF has in place governance structures that enable it to function effectively. A Board of Trustees is the governing body of the Fund and is comprised of eleven (11) Trustees being; five (5) Employer Trustees, five (5) Employees Trustees and one (1) Independent Specialist Trustee appointed by the Board of Trustees.
body.processed: Botswana Public Officers Pensions Fund (BPOPF) is the biggest pension fund in Botswana. The Fund was registered in 2001 as a result of a Government decision to change the Public Officers Pension arrangement from a Defined Benefit Pension Scheme to a Defined Contribution Pension Scheme. The Fund has experienced phenomenal growth since its inception owing to the overwhelming positive response as public servants exercised their option to join the fund. At the heart of what we do is our focus on our members and pensioners, which compels us to constantly and consistently seek solutions to meet their needs. As is required by the Retirement Funds Act, the BPOPF has in place governance structures that enable it to function effectively. A Board of Trustees is the governing body of the Fund and is comprised of eleven (11) Trustees being; five (5) Employer Trustees, five (5) Employees Trustees and one (1) Independent Specialist Trustee appointed by the Board of Trustees.

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Nyeri County mission ist to create and sustain an environment that unlocks the potential of the people of Nyeri to achieve progressive socio-economic growth by running an open government. Nyeri County is composed of 8 sub-counties and 30 wards. The sub-counties include: Kieni East, Kieni West, Mathira East, Mathira West, Nyeri Central, Mukurweini, Tetu and Othaya.

body.value: Nyeri County mission ist to create and sustain an environment that unlocks the potential of the people of Nyeri to achieve progressive socio-economic growth by running an open government.  Nyeri County is composed of 8 sub-counties and 30 wards. The sub-counties include: Kieni East, Kieni West, Mathira East, Mathira West, Nyeri Central, Mukurweini, Tetu and Othaya. The wards include: Aguthi, Chinga, Dedan Kimathi, Endarasha/Mwiyogo, Gakawa, Gatarakwa, Gatitu/Muruguru, Gikondi, Iriani (Mathira), Iriaini (Othaya), Kabaru, Kamakwa/Mukaro, Karatina, Karima, Kiganjo/Mathari, Kirimukuyu, Konyu, Magutu, Mahiga, Mugunda, Mukurweini-Central, Mukurweini-West, Mweiga, Narumoru/Kiamathaga, Rugi, Ruguru, Ruringu, Rware, Thegu and Wamagana.

attributes.title: China Railway Major Bridge Engineering Group (MBEC)

attributes.name: title
attributes.content: China Railway Major Bridge Engineering Group (MBEC) | Project Pipeline

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: China Major Bridge Engineering Co., Ltd (hereinafter referred to as the Company or MBEC) is a wholly-owned subsidiary of China Railway Group Limited which is listed in the stock market by Stock A601390 and Stock H0390. The history of the Company can be traced back to Major Bridge Engineering Bureau, Ministry of Railway of P.R.C, which was established for the construction of the first bridge in China--Wuhan Yangtze River Bridge.

body.value: China Major Bridge Engineering Co., Ltd (hereinafter referred to as the Company or MBEC) is a wholly-owned subsidiary of China Railway Group Limited which is listed in the stock market by Stock A601390 and Stock H0390. The history of the Company can be traced back to Major Bridge Engineering Bureau, Ministry of Railway of P.R.C, which was established for the construction of the first bridge in China--Wuhan Yangtze River Bridge. The Company is a large four-in-one integrated construction enterprise that combines bridge scientific research, reconnaissance and design, construction and equipment manufacturing business, specialized in bridge construction over rivers, lakes and seas under various harsh or severe geological and environmental conditions.
body.processed: China Major Bridge Engineering Co., Ltd (hereinafter referred to as the Company or MBEC) is a wholly-owned subsidiary of China Railway Group Limited which is listed in the stock market by Stock A601390 and Stock H0390. The history of the Company can be traced back to Major Bridge Engineering Bureau, Ministry of Railway of P.R.C, which was established for the construction of the first bridge in China--Wuhan Yangtze River Bridge. The Company is a large four-in-one integrated construction enterprise that combines bridge scientific research, reconnaissance and design, construction and equipment manufacturing business, specialized in bridge construction over rivers, lakes and seas under various harsh or severe geological and environmental conditions.

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Down Touch is a company aim is to become a leading supplier in the Civil Construction Industry in Southern Africa, providing concise and quality services that are scalable for growth across the region. Down Touch currently tenders and executes contracts for the construction, repairs, maintenance, and resurfacing of roads, streets, storage yards, parking lots, airport taxiways, and runways. Our road work relies on materials from our asphalt plants, which also supply other contractors.

body.value: Down Touch is a company aim is to become a leading supplier in the Civil Construction Industry in Southern Africa, providing concise and quality services that are scalable for growth across the region. Down Touch currently tenders and executes contracts for the construction, repairs, maintenance, and resurfacing of roads, streets, storage yards, parking lots, airport taxiways, and runways. Our road work relies on materials from our asphalt plants, which also supply other contractors. Over the years, we have expanded our operations, owning and maintaining machinery capable of handling contracts of all sizes. Experienced personnel oversee road construction activities, emphasizing quality, timely delivery, and competitive pricing.

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: HyShiFT Consortium is a global collective of partners working together to produce Sustainable Aviation Fuel, known as E-Kerosene. The four stakeholders are Linde, Sasol, Enertrag, and Hydregen  are all part of the same story, which is a collaboration to create and use green hydrogen for the production of aviation (jet) fuel. Each partner contributes their own expertise within the renewable sector: Enertrag produces renewable power from wind and solar resources, Linde produces green hydrogen and Sasol converts these two inputs into green aviation fuel through its FT reactor.

body.value: HyShiFT Consortium is a global collective of partners working together to produce Sustainable Aviation Fuel, known as E-Kerosene. The four stakeholders are Linde, Sasol, Enertrag, and Hydregen are all part of the same story, which is a collaboration to create and use green hydrogen for the production of aviation (jet) fuel. Each partner contributes their own expertise within the renewable sector: Enertrag produces renewable power from wind and solar resources, Linde produces green hydrogen and Sasol converts these two inputs into green aviation fuel through its FT reactor.

body.processed: GMH Luxurv is Nigeria's most innovative and luxury driven real estate firm. With a track record of over half a billion dollars in asset, GMH Luxury has become the ultimate convergence of unrivaled architecture in the luxury real estate sector. In an insatiable quest for perfection, they have gone beyond boundaries of human limitations, broken the ceiling of mediocrity, and built a company that is the definition of EXCELLENCE! They are GMH- the very prcis of distinction, not a minute less, not a minute late! They are second to none! They have built a profound reputation hinged on the foundations of Integrity and Quality

field_location_details.value: 2a Louis Solomon Cl, off Ahmadu Bello Way, Victoria Island, Lagos 101241, Lagos, Nigeria

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Hive Energy is on a mission to save the planet. They are a global green company harvesting the power of the sun, wind, and water to create successful renewable energy projects in more than 20 countries.As well as our clean energy projects, they invest in the Circular Economy to support low emission start ups expand their businesses.Hive has established some of the worlds leading solar projects, including the UKs largest solar park, multiple upcoming green hydrogen plants in Spain, and plans for the worlds largest Green Ammonia plant in South Africa.

body.value: Hive Energy is on a mission to save the planet. They are a global green company harvesting the power of the sun, wind, and water to create successful renewable energy projects in more than 20 countries. As well as our clean energy projects, they invest in the Circular Economy to support low emission start ups expand their businesses. Hive has established some of the worlds leading solar projects, including the UKs largest solar park, multiple upcoming green hydrogen plants in Spain, and plans for the worlds largest Green Ammonia plant in South Africa.
